questions.quote: Oh no no, Mr. Pitt, you mustn't. You have to check with the pharmacy before you combine anything with your heart medicine,
Yeah?  You see, this is the kind of idea you should be coming in with. What the hell do you do round here all day anyway?
Pilot? So what do you make for something like that? Fifty? Sixty thousand?
You mean my crime of passion? If anyone betrays me, I never forget!
'Man's best friend'. Jerry, I want something like that on my tombstone.
George, there's no time! Tell him your code! Shout out your code, man!!
Okay, THAT'S IT! "oki on awa" Where's my tail? I heard every word you said. You got some nerve.
Ok, I'm excited. I just don't happen to like exclamation points.
Well what about these nitwits that get on a plane with nothing to read? You know who these people are?
Alright, alright, but no funny business, same deal as last night.
